contexts.context: ...in secret to a Dwemer smith and asked for an enchanted <mark>ring</mark> that would help him. The ring gave its wearer great powers...
...and asked for an enchanted ring that would help him. The <mark>ring</mark> gave its wearer great powers of persuasion; for safety,...
...to instantly kill anyone who wore it except Nerevar. The <mark>ring</mark> was called Moon-and-Star, and it helped Nerevar unite...
...allies. Nerevar was killed in the battle, and his <mark>ring</mark> lost, but Nerevar's alliance survives in Morrowind's ruling political institution...
...in the harmful, disease-laden weather called 'blight,' <mark>rings</mark> the volcano's outer slopes, and is broken only at Ghostgate...
